    • FarmerActionRestDAO

      public FarmerActionRestDAO()

  • Method Details

    • plantCrop

      public void plantCrop​(String username, int plotNumber, String cropName)
      Plant a specified crop on a specified plot of a given farmer in the database.

      The farmer's inventory will have the corresponding crop deducted.

      Parameters:
      username - The username of the farmer planting the crop.
      plotNumber - The number of the plot to plant the crop in.
      cropName - The name of the crop to plant.
      Throws:
      ServerException - If the inventory is insufficient.

    • clearPlot

      public void clearPlot​(String username, int plotNumber)
      Clears a specified plot of a given user in the database.

      If the crop is wilted, then 5 gold will be deducted from the farmer's wealth.

      Parameters:
      username - The username of the farmer planting the crop.
      plotNumber - The number of the plot to clear the crop from.
      Throws:
      ServerException - If there is insufficient wealth.

    • harvest

      public void harvest​(String username)
      Harvests all ready crops from all plots of a farmer on the database.

      The generated gold and XP will be added to the farmer's wealth and XP.

      Any record of previous stealers of harvested plots will be cleared, allowing others to steal from the plot again should another crop be ready to harvest.

      Parameters:
      username - The username of the farmer harvesting crops.

    • steal

      public List<StealingRecord> steal​(String stealerName, String victimName)
      Steal harvestable crops from another user.

      All stolen yields are generated on the server.

      One user is allowed to steal a random integer 1-5% of crops from a plot, and one plot can only have a maximum of 20% of crops stolen from it by all users.

      The generated gold and XP will be added to the stealer's wealth and XP.

      Once stolen from, a plot cannot be stolen from again by the same user until it is replanted.

      Parameters:
      stealerName - The username of the farmer stealing.
      victimName - The username of the farmer being stolen from.
      Returns:
      A list of what was stolen, in the form of StealingRecord.

    • sendGifts

      public void sendGifts​(String sender, String[] recipients, String cropName)
      Send a gift at no cost to a friend.
      Parameters:
      sender - The username of the farmer sending the gift.
      recipients - An array of usernames of recipients to send to.
      cropName - The crop to send.
      Throws:
      ServerException - If any recipient already received a gift from the sender today.

    • acceptGifts

      public void acceptGifts​(String username)
      Accept all pending gifts.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user accepting gifts.
